wiki.content: According to the Rock and Roll Songfacts, as the title suggests, the song is based on one of the most popular structures in Rock And Roll; namely, the 12 bar blues progression (in A). The phrase "Rock and Roll" was a term Blues musicians used, which meant sex. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the Rock and Roll Songfacts, as the title suggests, the song is based on one of the most popular structures in Rock And Roll; namely, the 12 bar blues progression (in A). The phrase "Rock and Roll" was a term Blues musicians used, which meant sex.

track.name: Rock and Roll
comments: It's been a long time since I rock and rolled, hell yeah!
"This is not from Led Zeppelin 4" IT ISSSSSSSSS
This is not from Led Zeppelin 4
Probably the first Zep song I heard,  love @ 1st listen!
I need eight arms so I can air everything to this.
Yeeeeeeeeeees Led Zep on last fm,turn it up and Rock n Roll
Now we are cookin' with gas !!! ..  In the fine tradition of Led Zep style.
good to see whoever has allowed Led Zep on last fm
One of the few bands after Woodstock that could still play.
My neighbors now know it: IT'S ROCK N' ROLL!
